word_mean: 变应性：因接触特定抗原(变应原)而在再次接触时发生的有害免疫反应，通常是指对某种外界抗原过敏(特应性变态反应或接触性皮炎)或药物原先则泛指一切变异的免疫反应、免疫和过敏状态，现已废弃这样的观点。Gell和Coombs把造成组织损伤的任何有害免疫反应，都称之为“变态反应”(见classification项下Gell and Coombs classification)
变应科：处理变应性疾患的诊断和治疗问题的医学专业

sentence.Network_en: Allergy to cats is one of the commonest causes of asthma.
sentence.Network_cn: 对猫类过敏是哮喘病发作最常见的诱因之一。

sentence.Network_en: Frequently sufferers of this kind of allergy are also sufferers of asthma.
sentence.Network_cn: 患有这种过敏症的人也经常会患有哮喘病。

sentence.Network_en: I developed a temporary allergy to the company of couples.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一时间很反感和情侣们在一起。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在变态反应（allergy）或过敏反应（hypersensitivity）中，抗原抗体的复合物与补体结合后，可使细胞释放大量组胺，从而引起组织细 …
生活英语单词大全 - 豆丁网 ... 流感 flu 过敏 allergy 吗啡 heroin.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... allegiance n． 忠诚，拥护 allergy n． 过敏症，厌恶 allergic adj． 过敏的，对„讨厌的.
化学及化工专业词汇英语翻译（A-Z） - 豆丁网 ... allene 丙二烯 allergy 过敏反应 allethrin 丙烯拟除虫菊酯.

list.abs: 食物变态反应(food allergy)也称为消化系统变态反应(allergic reaction of digestive system)或过敏性胃肠炎(allergic gastroenteritis),食物过敏(food allergy)等,是.
nasal 鼻的nasal allergy 变应性鼻炎nasal asthma 鼻性孝喘
药物过敏(drug allergy)是人类最早观察到的过敏现象之一。在历史上,随着人类寻找药物以治疗疾病,相继而产生的便有药物的中毒与过敏。相传我国古代药物学的始祖神农.
英文翻译？_爱问知识人 ... 面部血丝 face was caked with bloodshot 皮肤过敏 skin allergy 鼻痒 nose tickles.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from German Allergie, from Greek allos 'other', on the pattern of Energie 'energy'

entry.def: If you have a particular allergy, you become ill or get a rash when you eat, smell, or touch something that does not normally make people ill.

example.ex: Food allergies can result in an enormous variety of different symptoms...
example.tran: 食物过敏会引发很多不同的症状。

example.ex: Allergy to cats is one of the commonest causes of asthma.
example.tran: 对猫类过敏是哮喘病发作最常见的诱因之一。

entry.def: If you say that you have an allergy to something or someone, you mean that you dislike them very strongly and try to avoid them.

example.ex: I developed a temporary allergy to the company of couples.
example.tran: 我一时间很反感和情侣们在一起。

means.word_mean: 1. hypersensitivity reaction to a particular allergen; symptoms can vary greatly in intensity
